title: MJD gives his Rams update & David Carr on the NFL trading deadline
itunes:title: MJD gives his Rams update & David Carr on the NFL trading deadline
description:
Dave Dameshek leaves Studio 66 for his new office and sits down first with Maurice Jones-Drew. MJD kibitzes with Shek about Todd Gurley's decision to fall down instead of scoring (2:00), why Ty Montgomery chose to return the kick (10:20) and how Aaron Donald is the most dominant defensive player he's ever seen (14:20). Next, David Carr stops by Shek's new office to chat about if his brother will be traded at the deadline (21:48) and the Browns decision to fire both Hue Jackson and Todd Haley (31:00).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
